website_summaries.verdict: A sleek stainless-steel cooler that holds a ton of drinks.
pros: The large capacity (80 quart) can cater to larger parties
Casters on the feet (2 having locks) makes this very portable
Bottom shelf is useful for storage
Comes with an attached bottle opener and cap catcher
Very well-insulated – drinks stayed cold with ice left unmelted even after full days in the summer sun
cons: Drain sits up a little from the side of the bottom of the cooler, so needs to be tipped or inverted to drain water out

customer_reviews.title: It is of good enough quality that you do not need to spend ...
customer_reviews.text: To the reviewer who said the ice melted in a few hours: we filled it with ice and drinks on one of the hottest days of the year and left it in the hot sun and there was plenty of ice still in it... 4 days later. The amount of insulation on this cooler is sufficient. It is of good enough quality that you do not need to spend more on the more expensive versions. This one is fine for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Toler

customer_reviews.title: Cooler works great... legs, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The cooler portion of the unit is fantastic, we had ice kept in there for over 8 hours. What is disappointing is the legs and "cart" aspect. The base is so thin that nothing can be kept on it except maybe some bar towels. We had the entire assembly buckle under moving it across a dining room. The front two wheels caught in a concrete seam in the room and it buckled under legs and all. However the bin stayed intact and did not even damage the interior lining.
customer_reviews.author: ALE

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this but I'm very disappointed in this cooler. Tub of cooler has a dent and the tray that goes underneath was bent and you can tell someone tried to bend it back with a tool as it's not only bent but scratched. Also, the ice doesn't stay very long. I put in 4 bags along with 23 bottles of already cool brews. The ice didn't last 24hrs. Way over priced for something that is subpar.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Derrow

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and functional - must have for entertainers.
customer_reviews.text: Look and function just as advertised. I've always wanted to have nice coolers for parties and large get togethers. I purchased two of these for a surprise 40th bday party for my wife - one for adult beverages and one for water & soda. Got tons of comments and compliments on how nice they were. Now I just need a good place to store them! ...or build out the patio I've always wanted and get the covers for them :)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good lasting cooler
customer_reviews.text: The stand is flimsy not highest material you will be tighten the screws often if used weekly. But very durable cooler and holds up to 3 small ice bags and 2 big ones. The ice if fulled to top will last 4 days on the 4th day at night there is cool water only. The amount of cans it can hold well on the bottom only about 48 cans or bottles soda cans are smaller than glass bottles so about 56 cans. then you can stack about 4 rows up really for the value a must buy from other coolers
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Product was damaged from the inside
customer_reviews.text: The cooler came damaged from the inside. Before I bought this cooler I read some of the reviews and a lot of them were complaining about the product comu g with some kind of damage. That is absolutely true, I bought it anyway because I liked ti looks and I mada a mistake. Don't make my same mistske. The only positive note is that Amazon took it back with no problem and best of all they came to.my home to pick up the cooler. Thank you Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Sossi

customer_reviews.title: works as dicribed
customer_reviews.text: My friend in Houston has one of these that is an older model, his doesn't doesn't have the points that stick up from the black legs to help you center the ice chest. This one is great. When you fill it with cold beverages and then ice it will keep the ice for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce L

customer_reviews.title: Legs of cart are horrible
customer_reviews.text: Upset about this one because at first I was so excited with how perfect I thought it was. The cooler itself is great and looks slick, except a black rubber piece fell off of one of the corners so now it’s wobbly when On the ground or table. The legs on the cart already broke... so the cooler sits at a slant and will probably break completely the next time I use it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G

customer_reviews.title: Good product with a couple design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: Couple problems with a good product. The top for the one I bought is black and just lights on fire when the sun hits it. Gotta be careful. Next, the seams look like they are starting to split. I haven't had it to long so it can't be wear and tear. And lastly, the top doesn't seem to fit properly. It's not tight enough and could benefit from sealing a bit better than it does. It is pretty dope but needs some tweaking to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Frame not steady and drain plug leaks even after tightening.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and one the frame is leaning and not steady and one wheel always gets stuck and will not roll. The drain plug has leaked since day one. I really loved these and we are having to return and hate that. We really had hoped they would be great especially with such great reviews. Sad to find out this product is not what we had wished for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a month
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just to keep ice in at my place of business. The cooler looks great however the stand is too cheap for the cooler. It literally buckled leaving us with a cooler on the ground and not useful for our customers. The drain never sealed and leaked all the time. I gave it 2 stars on easy to clean because it might have been if we didn't have to sit on the ground to do it. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: heather  Coop

customer_reviews.title: Base is made of thin metal.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking ice chest. It's very roomie inside and fits a lot of drinks. This is made better than many others but the base is a bit flimsy. On the patio there is always cracks in the concrete and the base wobbles and seems to want to bend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It was very nice, but missing a box of parts with drain plug, handles, bottle opener, cap catcher, and all the screws. It did have 800 # but took multiple emails to get them to ship parts. Hopefully they arrive in time!
customer_reviews.author: cd

customer_reviews.title: Study and mobile
customer_reviews.text: Nice cooler on wheels that you can assemble in 5 minutes. Rolls around easily and can be taken off the stand by just lifting it up. The stainless steel makes the cooler look more elegant for parties. Highly recommend for parties and BBQs.
customer_reviews.author: babiesrfatTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This does the job ......... however the top is lose meaning be careful opening cause a few times the lid fell on the ground. Wish there was a mount in the middle to keep the lid in place and not risk dropping on the ground
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Good cooler, crappy cart
customer_reviews.text: Cooler is great. The cart is cheaply constructed. If you plan on keeping it stationery, it should hold but if you plan on rolling it around with a full cooler, good luck. Mine broke within a month. It can't handle the cooler full of ice and drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Kipi

customer_reviews.title: needs clasp to hold top to bottom
customer_reviews.text: when going thru door way and you have to lift over the threshold it separates and is very irritating and creates a mess
customer_reviews.author: fxfixer

customer_reviews.title: Dents, Dents and Done
customer_reviews.text: 4/7/19 - I have ordered this product twice and I am done. The first one had a rip in the box from UPS and was dented. Amazon returned it no problem and another one was shipped out. This box was perfect, but in the inside, the platform tray was dented. It's going back and I'm done. Unbelievably frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, easy assembly.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good for deck parties. It was really easy to assemble - it took about 7 minutes to put together - I think it took longer to get all the little styrofoam bits off. It did require a good wipe-down and was dustier than I would have expected. The cooler itself is good quality and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Terrano

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged. Cracks in the base.
customer_reviews.text: I finally got to use the cooler for the first time. And unfortunately it is after the return window because there are two cracks in the base of the cooler!! Dissapponted!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: SUPER crappy
customer_reviews.text: This arrived with a dent on the inside and on the frame. I am giving this a bad review because after using it 2x uses the freaking screws fell out of the frame!!!
customer_reviews.author: EagleEyes

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: Terrible, ordered two of these and returned both. Both were damaged on the inside and one was coming apart at seam on outside.
customer_reviews.author: Blue cheese

customer_reviews.title: Terrible item. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not leave product reviews but found it necessary in this case. The item arrived missing an important part, a tub foot to attach the cooler to the stand. The tub its self was dirty, the packing was damaged and the tub was scratched and broken. Terrible item.
customer_reviews.author: JSS89

customer_reviews.title: Wish we would have bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for parties by the pool! Great quality and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cover was scratched on the inner cover top.
customer_reviews.text: The cover was scratched on the inner cover top. As if someone tried to clean it with a scouring pad. I paid full price for a brand new cooler, but it appears it may have been a return.I would like to speak to someone regarding this issue. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: P. Gotanda

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler. Kept ice most of the day in high 90’s. But even when ice began to melt it stayed cold. Easy to use and and put together. We love it
customer_reviews.author: b.steder

customer_reviews.title: Yeppers... it'll do.
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to move around. No way to attach the cooler to the cart. Otherwise, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful ice chest. Just wish it didn’t arrive dented but it’s on the back so not a big deal. We added foam where the air leaks in the middle of the lid which helps keep the ice from melting to quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The first cooler the screws were stripped and would not screw in all the way and then wouldn’t come out. But they send me a replacement cooler and took the other one back, no charge. Super customer service. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Item received damaged inside cooler
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice cooler except I received it with two cuts inside cooler. One was all the way through the plastic. Problem is it's too difficult to package and return, so I'll regrettably live with the damaged cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep ice for long.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't keep ice for long. It's good for a party but I have coolers that keep ice for 3-5 days. This one is about a half a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered damaged
customer_reviews.text: Bought two ice chests. Both the carts were dented when delivered and one ice chess had a hole on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Busse

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful on the outside but does not keep ice intact as promised. Still love it, though. Sharp looking.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, huge with plenty of space for all ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality,huge with plenty of space for all your drinks.Easy to clean and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The cooler was damaged the day i recived. I had to return it ,then when i went to buy another one it was more expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured, holds ice for days. Great product
customer_reviews.text: It had a small dent in it. But it works great
customer_reviews.author: Sommer Carroll

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together. I’m very happy with my Trinity cooler 😁 Love it! It also came in perfect condition I have nothing bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Keikilani Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A little small but serves its purpose .. serving cold beers !
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ngo

product_meta.title: TRINITY TXK-0803 Outdoor Cooler, 80 Quart, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Size:80 quartEntertain in style with an 80 quart/20 gallon/96 aluminum can capacity. This sleek stainless steel cooler/ice cart has a detachable tub so you have the option of keeping the cooler mobile, or detaching for easy portability to any game, party, or event. Bottle opener and cap catcher make for easy bottle opening, and the bottom shelf provides extra storage space allowing for easy refills.
feature_bullets: Detachable cooler tub for easy portability
Attached bottle opener and cap catcher
3" x 1" casters for easy mobility (2) locking (2) Non-Locking

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars82 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
